name: AI-Enabled SEO Strategies
description: Recommendations on how to adapt SEO strategies for the AI-enabled era, focusing on changes and best practices for content optimization.
user_context: recommendations on how to do SEO (or AEO / GEO) in an AI enabled era. This is an important part of building a brand and awareness in modern content strategy.
steps: Shift from exact match keyword targeting to breadth and depth of relevant content
Target longer-tail specific queries rather than high-volume short-tail keywords
Prioritize up-to-date information, personal experiences, and niche angles over generic content
